caption.paragraph:
Figure 7.
Thoracostrongylus birmanus , ( Fauvel, 1895 )
, male and female from Hainan and Yunnan, China. (A) 8th sternite, male; (B) 10th tergite, male; (C) 9th sternite, male; (D) 10th tergite, female; (E) genital segment with second gonocoxite, female; (F) aedeagus, ventral view; (G) aedeagus, lateral view. Scale bar 1 mm.

Figure 8.
Thoracostrongylus formosanus Shibata, 1982
, male and female from Sichuan, Zhejiang, Hunan, Fujian, Hubei and Taiwan, China. (A) 8th sternite, male; (B) 10th tergite, male; (C) 9th sternite, male; (D) genital segment with second gonocoxite, female; (E) 10th tergite, female; (F) aedeagus, ventral view; (G) aedeagus, lateral view. Scale bar 1 mm.
